T04TD3958E:306b-1: da sh'a ku sha la karma pa th'a /
T04TD3958E:306b-3: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa /
T04TD3958E:306b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3958E:306b-5: gang zhig bde 'gro thob par 'dod pas spang bar bya ba'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'di lta ste /
T04TD3958E:307a-0: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum @307a * //
T04TD3958E:307a-2: / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang //
T04TD3958E:307a-3: yid kyi rnam pa gsum po dang //
T04TD3958E:307a-4: 'di bcu mi dge ba ru gsungs //
T04TD3958E:307a-5: 'di rnams rab tu phye nas bshad par bya ste /
T04TD3958E:307a-6: de la re zhig lus kyi ni srog gcod pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-7: ma byin par len pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-9: ngag gi ni brdzun du smra ba dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-13: yid kyi ni brnab sems dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-16: de la srog gcod pa ni srog chags su gyur pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-17: srog chags su 'du shes par gyur pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-18: gsod pa'i sems nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-19: de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-21: yan lag lnga po de dag dang ldan na srog gcod pa yin no //
T04TD3958E:307a-22: de la ma byin par len pa gang zhe na /
T04TD3958E:307a-24: pha rol gyis yongs su bzung bar yang 'du shes pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-25: rku ba'i sems kyang nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-26: de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-27: gnas nas bskyod pa ste yan lag lnga po de dag dang ldan na ma byin par len par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3958E:307a-28: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3958E:307a-31: yan lag ma yin pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-32: 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3958E:307a-33: de la yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-34: sku gzugs la sogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-38: pha ma la sogs pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-39: bla ma dang nye bar gyur pa'o //
T04TD3958E:307a-40: dus ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni nyin par dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-41: zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-46: yid mi bde bas nye bar gdungs pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-47: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'o //
T04TD3958E:307a-48: yan lag ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni kha dang bshad pa'i lam dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-49: khye'u dang bu mo'i mdun dang rgyab kyi bug pa dang rang gi lag pa'o //
T04TD3958E:307a-50: 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa ni /
T04TD3958E:307a-51: gzhan gyi bud med thams cad dang /
T04TD3958E:307a-56: gzhan gyis blangs pa'i smad 'tshong ma dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-0: de ltar rang @307b gi chung ma la brten nas 'dod pas log par g-yem par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3958E:307b-1: de la brdzun du smra ba zhes bya ba ni dngos por yang ma gyur pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-2: dngos po'i gnas skabs las nyams par gyur pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-3: log par 'du shes par gyur pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-4: log pa'i thabs kyang nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang ;
T04TD3958E:307b-5: de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-6: brdzun gyi tshig kyang smras pa ste /
T04TD3958E:307b-7: yan lag lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na brdzun du smra bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3958E:307b-8: phra ma zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sems kyis gzhan 'byed pa'i tshig go //
T04TD3958E:307b-9: tshig rtsub po zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi gnad la phog pa'i sdang tshig go //
T04TD3958E:307b-10: tshig 'khyal pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang nye bar ldan pas sam /
T04TD3958E:307b-11: chags pa dang nye bar ldan pas smra bar bya ba ma yin pa smra ba'o //
T04TD3958E:307b-12: brnab sems zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi rdzas dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-13: dbang phyug dang longs spyod rnams la chags pa'i sems mi bzad pa'o //
T04TD3958E:307b-14: gnod sems zhes bya ba ni sems can la rnam par sdang ba dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-19: log par lta ba zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa med /
T04TD3958E:307b-31: legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med ces pa'o //
T04TD3958E:307b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T04TD3958E:307b-33: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-34: theg pa chen po'i mdo las 'byung ba /
T04TD3958E:307b-35: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ni dmyal ba chen po'i rgyu yin te /
T04TD3958E:307b-36: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsten pas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3958E:307b-37: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa /
T04TD3958E:307b-38: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3958E:307b-40: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
T04TD3958E:307b-41: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
